questions.quote: Hi. JERRY: You might not know it to look at me, but I can run really, really fast.
No. You are not a man. It takes a *long* time to become a man. I mean, half my friends aren't even there yet.
She told me. She said she's never had a man stir up all of these feelings inside of her. She's questioning her faith. She's thinking of leaving the church.
Well, then what did you loan her the five thousand for? Oh, look, maybe she won't take it. I mean, she did say that she was gonna think about it.
Oh, this is good. This Kruger guy is clueless. I can't wait to work for him.
I heard a little ping in the car last time. What was that ping?
Oh! but I do. There's probably fleas crawling all over your little snack bar.
Oh, the nerve. You know, some people have asked me if you've uh, done that.
My friends, a toast. As the wolly-haired Melanasians of Papua, New Guinea once said,  All right! Who's dancing?  No one? Alright, I'll just have to get things started.
I calculated my odds of ever getting together with a Portuguese waitress. Mathematically, I had to do it, Jerry.
